description: This file defines a theming utility class for a Flutter application. It includes color constants and a method to generate a light theme utilizing Material Design 3 components, customizing colors and widget themes.

classes.name: AppTheme
classes.description: A utility class providing color constants and a method to generate a light theme for the Flutter app.

methods.name: light
methods.description: Creates and returns a ThemeData object configured for a light theme, using predefined color constants, and customizing various UI component themes.

methods.name: success
methods.description: Getter that returns the success color used in the theme.

methods.name: border
methods.description: Getter that returns the border color used in the theme.

methods.name: badgeRed
methods.description: Getter that returns a red color used for badges.

methods.name: ratingStar
methods.description: Getter that returns a color used for rating stars.

methods.name: accentPink
methods.description: Getter that returns the accent pink color.

methods.name: accentOrange
methods.description: Getter that returns the accent orange color.
